title: Library outline view unable to select items at first attempt
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. 

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the library outline view. 
2. Attempt to select any item in the view (e.g., label item).

Observed Behavior: When attempting to select an item for the first time, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node in the outline view. The desired item cannot be selected.

Expected Behavior: The item in the library outline view should remain selected when clicked on for the first time.
